Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Let's see what you've chose to serve me.
Speaker.line2: I hope they're all edible, at least.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: Which country considers this as black tea?!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: I completely run out of word to say.
Speaker.line3: You are definitely going to be reported!!
